name: River of Souls
description:
We made this in lass than a day because the intended entry was way overscoped.

You’re on a bridge when the ends collapse, and you’re stuck with your soul gem harvester!

Post your best collected!

Controls

WASD to move

Click to shoot (and destroy the wooden things hurting your bridge)

 Right Click to suck (the blue things - this is your score)

Tips

Shooting knocks you back a bit

If you fall in the water or reach zero resilience you die
